abstract: The search for unconventional financing for Rusal’s I.P.O. played a large role in getting the sprawling Russian aluminum giant’s offering off the ground.
snippet: The search for unconventional financing for Rusal’s I.P.O. played a large role in getting the sprawling Russian aluminum giant’s offering off the ground.
lead_paragraph: Oleg V. Deripaska, the Russian oligarch, was so deeply in debt at the onset of the financial crisis that Russian and Western banks could have bankrupted his company, the sprawling aluminum giant Rusal, within months.

headline.main: Russian Oligarch’s Long Road to Hong Kong I.P.O.
